content: I moved the CQF Measures IG to the HL7 repository, but the one under CQFramework is still on the build server. If it's easy to do, can there be a redirect from http://build.fhir.org/ig/cqframework/cqf-measures to http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/cqf-measures?
We don't have an easy way (right now) to create redirects like this. Is it important to preserve links for the CI build?
No, just wondered if it was easy to do. Is it easy to just remove the old one (at http://build.fhir.org/ig/cqframework/cqf-measures)?
Why not just push a new index.html (<meta http-equiv="Refresh" content="0; url=http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/cqf-measures" />) that redirects to the new guide?
That can work if you push an IG with this content... but it also breaks github forwarding from the old repo URL to the new one.
Yeah, if I'd thought of that before I transferred it on github that would be a great solution.
